name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ONE CLICK to create short link with ZII.ONE

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a short link for the current tab using ZII.ONE API
